name: locale
description: The user's default location, which is optional. This may be explicitly set to null when updating a user to unset it. This is used for purposes of localizing such items as currency, date time format, or numerical representations. If provided, a valid value is a language tag as defined in RFC 5646. The following are example tags: fr, en-US, es-419, az-Arab, x-pig-latin, man-Nkoo-GN
